articles.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman married his longtime partner Oliver Mulherin at his $43 million Hawaii estate. Mulherin  is a software engineer by profession and holds a degree in computer science from the University of Melbourne.
articles.content:

articles.title: Adani gets order from SECI to set up electrolyser facility for green hydrogen - BusinessLine
articles.description: Adani Enterprises' subsidiary receives order to set up electrolyser manufacturing capacity for green hydrogen under government scheme.
articles.content: Adani Enterprises subsidiary has received an order from Solar Energy Corporation of India to set up electrolyser manufacturing capacity under the Production Linked Incentive Scheme for green hydrogen… [+1135 chars]
